org.easybatch.core.api

Interface RecordProcessor<I,O>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - The input object type.
    O - The output object type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComputationalRecordProcessor<I,O,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRecordDispatcher, BroadcastRecordDispatcher, ContentBasedRecordDispatcher, RandomRecordDispatcher, RoundRobinRecordDispatcher

    public interface RecordProcessor<I,O>
    Interface for record processor. A record processor performs some business logic on an input object and produces an output object. The output object may be of another type of the input object and will be piped out to the next processor if any.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      O processRecord(I record)
      Process a record.

    • Method Detail

      • processRecord

        O processRecord(I record)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Process a record.
        Parameters:
        record - the record to process.
        Returns:
        the processed record, may be of another type of the input object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown if an exception occurs during record processing
